isDot.description: No numbers are shown, just a small dot
isDot.description_zh: 不展示数字，只有一个小点

:value.description: The displayed number is displayed as ${overflowCount}+ when it is greater than overflowCount, and is hidden when it is 0 and show-zero is false
:value.description_zh: 展示的数字，大于 overflowCount 时显示为 ${overflowCount}+，为0且show-zero为false时隐藏

max.description: Maximum, exceeding the maximum value will show '{max}+'
max.description_zh: 最大值，超过最大值会显示 '{max}+'

showZero.description: When the value is 0, whether to display the badge
showZero.description_zh: 当数值为 0 时，是否展示 Badge

bgColor.description: If the background color has a higher priority than the type, if you set it, the type parameter will be invalid
bgColor.description_zh: 背景颜色，优先级比type高，如设置，type参数会失效

shape.description: Logo shape, circle-all corners are rounded, horn-bottom left corner is a right angle
shape.description_zh: 徽标形状，circle-四角均为圆角，horn-左下角为直角

numberType.description: The display method of the set number is detailed in the above document
numberType.description_zh: 置数字的显示方式，详细见上方文档

offset.description: Set the position offset of the badge in the format of [x, y], that is, the values set to top and right, and absolute is valid when true
offset.description_zh: 设置badge的位置偏移，格式为 [x, y]，也即设置的为top和right的值，absolute为true时有效

inverted.description: Whether to invert the background and font color
inverted.description_zh: 是否反转背景和字体颜色

absolute.description: The offset parameter is valid only when the component is absolutely positioned
absolute.description_zh: 组件是否绝对定位，为true时，offset参数才有效
